project_name: Grand River - Site Access Plans
project_description:
The consultant will work with the City of Grand Rapids staff and stakeholders to perform the following work. All work is to follow the River for All Guidelines and all other applicable plans and guides.

North Monroe Site – 555 Monroe Ave NW  - Interim Site Improvements -
Develop construction plans, specifications, and opinion of probable cost for interim site improvements for the 2-5 years between Phase I and Phase III of the Grand River Revitalization Project, which anticipated to start between 2023 to 2025.
The design shall factor in the needs for recreation on the site and for non-motorized boating and pedestrian access to the river.
Hold one public meeting to engage local stakeholders who are anticipated to include the Monroe North Business Association, DGRI, and downtown residents.
The deliverables will be included in the MDEQ permit application for the Grand River Revitalization project.  
East River Edge – Approximately Blue Bridge to JW Marriott - Site Restoration and Improvements 
Prepare construction plans, specifications, and opinion of probable cost to improve the river edge to accommodate increased use, enhance user experience and repair the undermining of the river pedestrian walkway on the east side of the river.  
The plan shall include native landscaping to enhance and beautify the area and access, such as steps, for river users to access the river at a variety of flood levels.
The deliverables will be included in the MDEQ permit application for the Grand River Revitalization project. Any information pertinent to the MDEQ permit will be provided to the City for inclusion in the MDEQ permit.

project_name: Grand River Revitalization Project
project_description:
Improvements Along the GRAND RIVER from Fulton Street to I-196 (Grand River Revitalization Project). To learn more about this project, visit https://grandrapidswhitewater.org

The Scope of this project is permits and project implementation including MEPA and MDEQ permits, finalize design development, final design phase services, securing construction manager services, project phasing determination, easements, grant and funding identification, project accounting, and administration up to the initial ground breaking.
